Mike Atkins, one of the Bikenetic Teamsters, rode his cargo bike TO work on Friday morning, WITH his mountain bike attached to the back and THEN rode it to the Leesburg Bakers Dozen afterwards to race on Saturday, completed SIX laps and THEN rode it back home to Annandale on Sunday morning!!
